pull.title: doc: Mention PR Club in CONTRIBUTING.md
pull.body: As we have a ["Review Club"](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/labels/Review%20club) label it would be worth mentioning it in the CONTRIBUTING.md file for beginners.

doc: Mention PR Club in CONTRIBUTING.md

events.message: doc: Mention PR Club in CONTRIBUTING.md

events.body: ACK 34d826ea5f900b6320f6ff070c3632155acb716e -- The Bitcoin Core PR Review Club is a great effort to introduce new contributors to the project in a positive and friendly way! We need that kind of newcomer friendly on-ramps to attract and educate the next generation of contributors! Kudos to @jnewbery for helping secure the project also in the super long-term :)

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ release cycle, overall merging, moderation and appointment of maintainers.

 [good first issue](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22)
-list.
+list or participate at a weekly [Bitcoin Core PR Review Club](https://bitcoincore.reviews/) meeting.
